column1: Uchi////I came here with the knowledge that the sushi BAR was part of well the BAR
column2: and that I was able to walk in and sit there
column3: after standing for an hour on heels
column4: finally a space at the bar was open and I was asked to moved because it wasn't part of the BAR even though it's called sushi BAR and it's not a table like the rest
column5: I think that's BS because that's not what I was told
column6: I think that they should've explained themselves better when I called
column7: if they would've told me that
column8: I wouldn't have waited all this time
